body: These planes have no magic at all. A plane with the dead magic trait functions in all respects like an antimagic field spell. Divination spells cannot detect subjects within a dead magic plane, nor can a spellcaster use teleport or another spell to move in or out. The only exception to the “no magic” rule is permanent planar portals, which still function normally.
url: pfsrd://Game Mastery Guide/Rules/Planar Adventures/Planar Traits/Magic Traits/Dead Magic
name: Dead Magic
